title: IVY Classic 40054 Swift Cut 4-1/2-Inch x 0.047-Inch x 7/8-Inch Arbor, Metal/Stainless Steel Thin Cut-Off Blade for Grinders, 1-Piece
features: Designed to cut stainless steel, angle iron, sheet metal and other ferrous metal products, Swift Cut (Registered Trademark)
Resin bonded Aluminum-Oxide grain for faster cutting, Type 1 blade - for cutting only
Blade double reinforced with fiberglass mesh for durability and safety
Arbor reinforced with metal for extra strength
description: IVY Classic Industries is dedicated to producing a comprehensive, quality line of power tool accessories and hand tools. IVY Classic Swift Cut Metal/Stainless Steel Thin Cut-Off Blades are constructed out of resin bonded aluminum-oxide grain which enables faster cutting of stainless steel, angle iron, sheet metal and other ferrous metal products. The blades feature double reinforced fiberglass mesh for durability and safety and metal reinforced arbors for extra strength. They are intended for use with angle grinders.
